review:
We very happily stumbled across Koha Surf Lounge during a visit to Unatawuna. Walking past, you immediately get enticed by the vibrant atmosphere. Once inside, the experience gets even better! 

We were seriously impressed by the contemporary menu + innovative cocktails on offer. You can...tell a lot of thought has gone into the dishes, which are super fresh & extremely delicious.

The team are also superb & obviously really enjoy working in such a great venue. 

Special thanks to Coco for making our experience so speci tell a lot of thought has gone into the dishes, which are super fresh & extremely delicious.

The team are also superb & obviously really enjoy working in such a great venue. 

Special thanks to Coco for making our experience so special.
Very nice, cozy ambiance with a refreshing and tasty menu. Friendly and helpful stuff. I can recommend everyone, especially for lunch.

Great food, I had the chicken burger and wife had the mezze platter. 

Both were delicious and service was great. 

A nice little chill out place if you're in Unawatuna.
Amazing experience. It’s a well curated place in every aspect, food,design and staff. Super tasty chicken sandwich great Salad and good espresso! Very important thing….its super clean!

Best vibes and food in Unawatuna! 

Tried the several dishes and all of them are really good. The service and the team is also top notch!

Definitely recommend ✊🏻

Great food and menu is also great for vegans and vegetarians. Very friendly staff! Also they take care of the street dog which is not very common in Sri lanka and I find it amazing🙏🏻 Highly recommended
Yet another enjoyable dinner.  Try the Lime Battered Prawns.  Very tasty.  Had to have Key Lime afterwards.  Great people.  Great service.

The Key lime pie is a winner.  My third visit to this gem at Unawatuna... it's great to see the menu developing.  Every meal has been good... fresh, well prepared.  The coffee is good, too.  All the staff are friendly and service is fast... which...is an unusual experience in my six months in Sri Lanka.  STRONGLY RECOMMENDED for casual lunch or dinner.  I am looking forward to when you're open for breakfa is an unusual experience in my six months in Sri Lanka.  STRONGLY RECOMMENDED for casual lunch or dinner.  I am looking forward to when you're open for breakfast!

Super friendly & chilled atmosphere
Very friendly and competent staff
Awesome quality of the meals
-> an awesome place

My first visit to Koha was three days ago.  Why didn't I go before????  What a great experience.  A lot about Koha really works for the Unawatuna vibe - first  is that it is a "Surf Lounge"!  The spacious layout is great and there is...a mixture of seating - day beds, tables or at the bar.  The menu is not extensive but does not need to be when it has attractive items... I had the Crispy Chicken Burger with Sweet potato chips then Mango and Coconut rice for desert.  Hanna and her husband who own Koha (I will get his name soon) were perfect hosts, she made us feel very welcome - when we were arrived there was limited seating but she offered us another table when one became available although we decided to stay where we were.  The Peanut Cup was a kind gesture at the end of the meal!  Oh yes, prices are good and service by the team was excellent although it was quite busy.  I STRONGLY RECOMMEND TRYING KOHA SURF LOUNGE for lunch or dinner.   See you again so a mixture of seating - day beds, tables or at the bar.  The menu is not extensive but does not need to be when it has attractive items... I had the Crispy Chicken Burger with Sweet potato chips then Mango and Coconut rice for desert.  Hanna and her husband who own Koha (I will get his name soon) were perfect hosts, she made us feel very welcome - when we were arrived there was limited seating but she offered us another table when one became available although we decided to stay where we were.  The Peanut Cup was a kind gesture at the end of the meal!  Oh yes, prices are good and service by the team was excellent although it was quite busy.  I STRONGLY RECOMMEND TRYING KOHA SURF LOUNGE for lunch or dinner.   See you again soon!
Really nice food combined with a chilled vibe. The menu is not very large, but the dishes are great. Also, if you like a good EU cappuccino, this is your spot.
Great for lunch or dinner. Really chilled out space with quick service, a small menu but everything we had was delicious! Very clean and well organised. If you are in unawatuna then worth a visit

Food was 10/10 and service was 10/10. Very chill spot with nice music. The only thing that brought down the rating was the heat! The place needs more air con/fans. We were very uncomfortable which made it difficult to enjoy the amazing food.More

Excellent eatery with a relaxed vibe  in the middle of unawatuna strip.
We tried a couple of things and everything was amazing.

Very bland food , as was the ambiance. The lamp shades were the best thing about it . If you have not eaten in any other restaurant inthe street & don’t enjoy the spice flavours of Sri Lankan food then you will enjoy the burgers. .
Excellent service from Indunil, who gave us great seafood recommendations and made us feel very at home. Will be back next time we looking to eat at Unawatuna beach.

Great sea food Sri Lanka style. 
Try the chili  crab and Sri Lanka style grilled calamari

Service is great too. Friendly staff and attentive

The meal was excellent. Grilled tuna was cooked to perfection. Indunil was very good advising on choices and accompaniments. He made sure drinks and the meals were brought to us quickly and he was always with a smile. Truly a five star experience. Excellent food...quality and servi quality and service.

Thaproban restaurant is a perfect place! We found it during our staying in Sri Lanka in 2022. We came back in 2023 and the first place we visited to have lunch was Thaproban! We love it! The food, the stuff, the service - everything is...perfe perfect!

Probably our favourite restaurant in Unawatuna. Food was excellent and staff were so friendly and helpful. We spent the evening on a table by the seas edge with lovely food ( fish) and wine with staff that couldn’t do enough for us. We then returned...for New Years Eve which was a buffet - Again excell for New Years Eve which was a buffet - Again excellent

The quality of the food is not at the level I would expect: spaghetti for a daughter was of poor quality, as well as rice served as a side dish. Lots of oil in grill and mayonnaise in a salad. Would not repeat the experience...though the service was frien though the service was friendly
Indunil good food and very good friendly service grade , 100% sure. Come that restaurant. I really recommend.
We had a nice evening at Thaproban Beach. Food was good and our waiter Tharindu was very friendly - he did a great job!
Excellent environment, good food and amazing staff - thanks Indu for the excellent tips and history lesson :)

Amazing restaurant and high quality service!  Delicious food, always fresh seafood and fish. The stuff is super friendly. Many thanks to our waiter Indu! He is really amazing, helpful and friendly! We will come again for sure!
Food and service was very good. Especialy  waiter Tharindu was very kind for us. Always helpful and nice.

Incredible meal! We had the fresh tuna and butter fish which was very affordable and setting right on the beach listening to the waves was unforgettable. The service was amazing - shout out to Tharindu and Sajith! We will be back tomorrow for lunch :)

The greeting was great with all smiles and very friendly and  accommodating.. was seated by the beach and the atmosphere and the ambiance was heartwarming..
Food was great and this server Kevin was one of a kind ! giving us all the professional assistance and...explained re food and even introduced the chef ..prior ordering the food.. we wined and dined to our heart content .. Try their chicken breast very moist and succulent..
Ask for Kevin he is very accommodat explained re food and even introduced the chef ..prior ordering the food.. we wined and dined to our heart content .. Try their chicken breast very moist and succulent..
Ask for Kevin he is very accommodating

Food was good but service by Captain Indunil was the best part of our experience, I would give him 5 stars personally. He shared with us a garlic/olive oil sauce with turned our ok meal into a great meal! Really enjoyed our chat with him!
Great spot to have lunch and relax while enjoying the beach views. Staff were friendly and attentive.
